modules.name: Intersect
modules.description: Rhythmic trigger generator using discrete gradient analysis - generates Euclidean and Euclidean-adjacent rhythms from CV signals

modules.name: Cycloid
modules.description: Polar Euclidean Sequencer - rotating clock hand triggers when crossing polygon vertices

modules.name: Moog LPF
modules.description: Classic Moog ladder lowpass filter with resonance, built with Faust DSP

modules.name: Modal Bell
modules.description: Physical model of a struck bar - Vibraphone, Marimba, Bell sounds with Faust DSP

modules.name: Big Reverb
modules.description: Lush stereo reverb with Zita Rev1 algorithm - high-quality FDN reverb with independent bass/treble decay, predelay, and damping

modules.name: Saturation Echo
modules.description: Vintage tape delay with saturation and wobble in the feedback loop, built with Faust DSP

modules.name: Spectral Resonator
modules.description: 6-band resonant filter bank for spectral chord processing - transforms noise and simple waves into lush melodic chords

modules.name: Plucked String
modules.description: Karplus-Strong physical model of a plucked string - creates guitar, harp, and plucked instrument sounds

modules.name: Chaos Flute
modules.description: Physical flute model with internal breath envelope and overblow chaos - from soft woodwind to screaming multiphonics

modules.name: Solina Ensemble
modules.description: Classic 3-voice BBD string ensemble effect - recreates the ARP Solina tri-phase chorus for massive orchestral strings

modules.name: Infinite Folder
modules.description: West Coast wavefolder - creates complex metallic harmonics by folding waveforms using sine function

modules.name: Space Cello
modules.description: Digital Yaybahar - coupled physical model with string, dispersive spring, and resonant tube body for sci-fi acoustic sounds

modules.name: The Abyss
modules.description: Waterphone - bowed metal rods with hydro-modulation for horror movie soundscapes

modules.name: Matter
modules.description: Physical model of a struck solid inside a resonant tube - morphs from strings to bells with acoustic chamber

modules.name: Gravity Clock
modules.description: Clock-synced bouncing ball physics - generates LFO and triggers locked to musical divisions with optional ratcheting decay

modules.name: Octo LFO
modules.description: Clock-synced 8-channel LFO with wave shaping - Skew, Curve, and Fold modifiers with mini scope per channel

modules.name: The Cauldron
modules.description: Fluid wave math processor - 4 inputs combined through 7 analog algorithms: Mix, Ring, Peaks, Valleys, Diff, Fold, Morph

modules.name: The Architect
modules.description: Poly-Quantizer & Chord Machine - 8 independent quantizer tracks with shared Key/Scale and chord generator
